TO: The President, International Bank for Reconstruction and Development
Report of Committee under Section 4 (iii) of Article III of the Articles of Agreement on the Proposed Loan (First Fiscal Effectiveness and Growth Development Policy Loan) to Romania.
The undersigned Committee constituted under Section 7 of Article V of the Articles of Agreement of International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (the Bank) hereby submits its report pursuant to Section 4 (iii) of Article III of said Articles in respect of the proposal that the Bank grant to Romania (the Borrower) a loan in an amount of seven hundred and fifty million Euro (EUR750,000,000). The purpose of said loan is to assist the Borrower's program aimed at: (i) strengthening its fiscal debt management and State Owned Enterprises' performance; and (ii) improving the functioning of property, energy and capital markets.
1. The Committee has carefully studied the merits of the proposal to grant such a loan, and of the purpose to which the proceeds of the loan are to be applied.
2. The Committee is of the opinion that the Program in support of which the proceeds of such loan are to be applied comes within the purposes of the Bank as set forth in Article I of said Articles of Agreement, and that said Program is designed to promote the development of the productive facilities and resources of Romania and is in the interest of Romania and of the members of the Bank as a whole.  -2-
ROMANIA (First Fiscal Effectiveness and Growth Development Policy Loan)
3. Accordingly, the Committee finds that said Program merits financial assistance from the Bank, and hereby recommends said Program for such assistance.
COMMITTEE
Senior Vice Pres ent and Group General Counsel
for / e- ert Selected by Governor Romania
Regional Vice President Europe and Central Asia Region
Vice President, World Bank Group Chief Risk Officer
.- yv Senior Vice President and Chief Economist Dated at Washington, D.C.
